price: They will be given their reward twice for their patience, repelling evil with good[26], and for spending out of what We have provided for them.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُؤۡتَوۡنَ أَجۡرَهُم مَّرَّتَيۡنِ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيَدۡرَءُونَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
footnotes: [26] i.e., compensating their misdeeds with good deeds, or responding to evil with what is good.
